page.title: 08WILBERFOSS THE VICAR
page.content: The vicar has only just come to the village and is still settling in. He thinks the attendance at church has in creased since his arrival and is now 2/3 full on Sundays. He thinks more people would come if they could see that the church is a caring place. By the kinds of services and the words used today he feels that the church is up to date. He thinks there should be more links with the Roman Catholic Church and also with schools. The vicar, he feels, should visit people, but he admits that he is so busy that he finds this difficult. He likes working and living in the village as there is more chance of getting to know people individually. His favourite church feast is Easter as he thinks it is the most important in the Christian year. If he wasn't a vicar he would be a doctor
